thm dfeven2(setvar s0) {

} = {
  eqtri(ceven, crab(s0, cz, wbr(nat2, cdvds, cv(s0))), crab(s0, cz, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))))))
  dfeven4(s0, hs0)
  rabbiia(s0, cz, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cv(s0)))
  bitr4d(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cv(s0))))
  rexbidva(hs0, cz, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cv(s0)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cv(s0)), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))
  eqcom(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))
  eqeq1d(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  mulcomd(nat2, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  2cnd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  zcn(cv(hs0))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wb(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cv(s0)), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat2), cv(s0)))), wcel(nat2, cz))
  2z()
  divides(hs0, nat2, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  diff.hs0.c(nat2)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))

blocks.pretty:
thm dfeven2(setvar s0) {
  ⊢ Even = { s0 ∈ ℤ | 2[||]s0 }
} = {
  eqtri(ceven, { s0 ∈ ℤ | 2[||]s0 }, { s0 ∈ ℤ | ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(2[×]hs0))})
  dfeven4(s0, hs0)
  rabbiia(s0, cz, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(2[×]hs0)), 2[||]s0)
  bitr4d(s0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(2[×]hs0)), 2[||]s0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(hs0[×]2)= s0))
  rexbidva(hs0, cz, s0 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(2[×]hs0), (hs0[×]2)= s0)
  syl5bb((s0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ), s0 =(2[×]hs0), (hs0[×]2)= s0, (2[×]hs0)= s0)
  eqcom(s0, (2[×]hs0))
  eqeq1d((2[×]hs0), s0, (hs0[×]2), (s0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ))
  mulcomd(nat2, hs0, (s0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ))
  2cnd((s0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ))
  adantl(s0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(hs0)
  mpan(s0 ∈ ℤ, (2[||]s0 ↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(hs0[×]2)= s0)), 2 ∈ ℤ)
  2z()
  divides(hs0, nat2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ∈ ℤ)
  diff.hs0.c(nat2)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
}

  dfodd6(s0, hs0)
  rabbiia(s0, cz, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cv(s0))))
  bitr4d(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cv(s0))), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cv(s0))))
  rexbidva(hs0, cz, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cv(s0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1), cv(s0))))
  eqcom(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, nat1))
  odd2np1(hs0, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
